Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Troubles and New Model
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop and other cavemen as they deal with dinosaur-related issues, from an old dinosaur's clumsiness to acquiring a new, potentially problematic one.

sub_scenes.title: Old Dinosaur's Clumsiness
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's dinosaur is having trouble and keeps bumping into trees, leading to frustration and an explanation from Wadiya about the dinosaur's old age.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a New Dinosaur Model
sub_scenes.description: Two cavemen decide to trade in their old dinosaur and visit Honest Zog's dealership to explore new options.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: Dinny and another caveman test drive a 'zip-piest' dinosaur, which bites one of them, but they still decide to purchase it.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Unexpected Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Trade-in
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop bids farewell to his old dinosaur and then rides Dinny to Honest Zog's dealership to trade him in.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to Honest Zog's Dealership with Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dealership Sales
sub_scenes.description: Scenes at Honest Zog's dealership involving dinosaur sales pitches and demonstrations, including Dinny's voice being recognized.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Price Haggling

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Rampage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny, the large dinosaur, going on a rampage and the reactions of other cavemen to his behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is accused of mistreating a dinosaur, attacked, and then comforted by a large dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Comfort and Reassurance from the Large Dinosaur

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Impending Charge
sub_scenes.description: Dinny, riding a large dinosaur, charges towards a group of cavemen who prepare for his arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: The Impending Charge and Boomer Kid Preparation

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing and Romantic Rejection
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with fishing plans, romantic invitations, and rejections, highlighting relationship dynamics and caveman interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation Attempts
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is invited to go fishing and then attempts to invite Ooola, but is rejected.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Frustrations and Arguments
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen fishing and arguing about women and noise scaring away the fish.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Noise and Womanly Insult

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Competition and Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic rivalry, infidelity, jealousy, and contrasting approaches to romance.

sub_scenes.title: News of Oola's Rival and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: News spreads about a romantic rival for Oola, leading to disbelief and then confrontation of the truth.

narrative_arcs.title: Confronting the Truth of Oola's Infidelity

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Attack and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A muscular caveman attacks a smaller caveman out of jealousy, but is then rejected by the woman he was fighting for.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Advice and Misguided Attempts
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss romance, contrasting violent and tender approaches, leading to misguided attempts to be romantic.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and the Crocodile

Major_Arcs.title: Angry Caveman and the Finger-Eating Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around an angry caveman, his jealousy, and a bizarre misunderstanding involving finger-eating and hand-kissing.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Jealousy and Gossip
sub_scenes.description: An angry caveman expresses jealousy and is gossiped about by other cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Finger-Eating Accusation and Twist
sub_scenes.description: The angry caveman is accused of cannibalism, specifically finger-eating, but it turns out to be a misunderstanding about hand-kissing.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Reconciliation and Fishing Chat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a couple's quarrel and reconciliation followed by a brief interlude with fishing cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusation and Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: A cavewoman accuses a caveman of infidelity, leading to public shaming, a plea for forgiveness, and a romantic turn.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Forgiveness and Frenchman Insult

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Cavemen's Chat
sub_scenes.description: A brief scene with fishing cavemen discussing women and fishing tactics.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Disastrous Effects
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts the dangers and social pressures surrounding a new dance craze called 'The Twitch'.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Injuries and Resistance
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from 'The Twitch' are becoming common, and Alley resists learning the dance despite Ooola's encouragement.

sub_scenes.title: Disastrous Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts to learn 'The Twitch' from Ooola, with comically painful and clumsy results.

narrative_arcs.title: 决心学习舞蹈和有条件的教学
课程结束与弗洛格小姐

sub_scenes.title: Public Humiliation and Hospital Chaos
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts to dance at the party, faces public mockery, and then discovers the widespread injuries caused by 'The Twitch', even to onlookers.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Ancient Spain for Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows researchers planning to use time travel to study 16th-century Spain, and Alley Oop's journey back in time.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Research Problem and Time Travel Plan
sub_scenes.description: Researchers discuss the lack of information on 16th-century Spain and decide to send Alley Oop back in time.

narrative_arcs.title: 西班牙历史研究的难题
派遣艾 Alley Oop 获取真相

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude and Time Travel Activation
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Ooola share a romantic moment before Alley is sent back in time via time machine.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in 20th Century and Spain Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Ooola arrive in the 20th century and are briefed by Dr. Wonmug about their mission to Spain.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley Oop's Spanish Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's experiences in ancient Spain, including misunderstandings, intervening in a serenade, and participating in a bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Initial Encounter in Spain
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop arrives in Spain and is immediately confronted by a Spanish-speaking man.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade Intervention and Bullfight Setup
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop intervenes in a street serenade, leading to conflict and his unexpected participation in a bullfight.

narrative_arcs.title: 女友的愤怒与身份揭露
斗牛比赛延误与替补方案

sub_scenes.title: Stone Age Bullfight Performance
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop performs in a bullfight using his Stone Age club, to the amusement and surprise of the audience.

narrative_arcs.title: 竞技场观众与经理的初步反应

sub_scenes.title: Return and Romantic Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop returns from Spain, faces romantic suspicion from Ooola, but is quickly asked about the information he gathered.

narrative_arcs.title: 竞技场上的赞扬与讽刺

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Royal Discontent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day' and the unexpected challenges and public reaction to temporary kingship.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Setup
sub_scenes.description: The premise of 'King for a Day' is established with cavemen carrying a 'king' on a stretcher.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Proclamation and Public Rebellion
sub_scenes.description: A new 'king' makes a proclamation but faces immediate and violent rejection from the people.

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and Ooma's Domestic Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously portrays the domestic conflicts between Guz and Ooma, focusing on cleanliness and misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Ooma scolds Guz for eating ulcer pills and then for having dirty feet on the clean floor, leading to a chase and Guz washing his feet.

Major_Arcs.title: The Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Selfishness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts a dispute over clams and the 'wise' but selfish solution offered by the King's wise man.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Argument and King's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Two cavemen argue over found clams, and the King intervenes, seeking a wise solution.

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Palace Chaos and Dinner Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts chaos at the royal palace, including a fight and the King's difficult dinner experience.

sub_scenes.title: Palace Fight and Financial Advice
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out at the 'MOONINA PALACE' while the wise man gives self-serving financial advice to the King.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Palace Fight

sub_scenes.title: King's Dinner and Servant's Assault
sub_scenes.description: The King's dinner is interrupted by a concerned but violent servant who worries about his ulcer.

narrative_arcs.title: The King's Dinner and Ulcer Concern

Major_Arcs.title: Random Encounters and Absurdity
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a collection of short, unconnected, and often absurd encounters between cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Job Refusal, and Relief
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of apology, job refusal, and a caveman's relief at returning to ordinary life.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Explanation After an Incident
Joy of Returning to Ordinary Life

sub_scenes.title: Leadership Proposal and Strange Duck Measurement
sub_scenes.description: A leadership proposal is made, followed by a bizarre scene of cavemen trying to measure a 'strange duck'.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring and Speculation About a Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling and Barbershop Scenes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes scenes of fortune telling and a visit to a barbershop, showcasing different aspects of caveman life.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Fortune Telling
sub_scenes.description: A woman visits a fortune teller in 'ROMANTIC ALLEY' and receives a romantic prophecy.

sub_scenes.title: Sudden Departure and Barbershop Visit
sub_scenes.description: A caveman abruptly leaves Ooola, followed by scenes in a barbershop where cavemen are getting shaved.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishap and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a time machine experiment that goes awry, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Setting Up Time Travel and Roman Visitor
sub_scenes.description: A man sets up a time machine expecting a visitor from the past but is surprised when a Roman soldier appears instead.

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contains two separate stories featuring King Guz: one about his clam debt and another about a chaotic day in his kingdom.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Alley rescues King Guz and immediately demands repayment of an old clam debt, highlighting Alley's opportunistic nature.
